content: Twenty years.For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve &quotsaints&quot were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called &quotcalamities&quot that were massacring the planet.
